title: Kronos Quartet CD
content:
Hi,  
do you know which is the font in this Kronos Quartet CD? I tried Proxima Nova which is a bit similar but the "O" is more condensed in this one and the "S" is different.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824194738im_/http:/typophile.com/files/91E2fOVzayL_4074._SL1425_.jpg)

Any hints? thanks ;)
author: uzapucax

comments.content:
Could be Kris Sowersby's [Calibre](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824194738/http:/www.klim.co.nz/retail-fonts/calibre).

EDIT: https link fixed.

Ryuk, that Calibre link took me to a blank Wiki page. Is that right?

- Mike Yanega

I found [this link](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824194738/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.behance.net/gallery/Calibre/6817173) for Calibre, and I agree that looks like a match.

- Mike Yanega
thanks for the good info ;) it does look like Calibre. Cheers
